org.grails.datastore.mapping.query.api
[Java] Interface Criteria

@java.lang.SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
public interface Criteria

Interface for the implementations that construct of criteria queries.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
